Text:
Thanks so much M. Crane!  this was so anime influence, funny that been dunn worked on some of it!

Speaking of Ben Dunn, been looking for his Warrior Nun Areala series, but it isn't available it seems, oh well

Thanks so much for this!  My next 2 Golden Age series will be the Flame and Catman, then Fighting Yank, and the GA Blue Beetle to name but a few!
